column13: Notes

Experimentation = Increased means the experiment showed the corallivore INCREASING disease, whereas the correlation means the corallivore was just positively correlated to disease (could be attracted to it or could be causing it)--these two things are combined in the "Effect" column, which is why we went back and split them up
